meanings.definition: Squid served as food, typically deep-fried.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant's calamari was crispy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: I ordered calamari at the seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The calamari danced in the hot oil, sizzling away.
meanings.sent4: The calamari on my plate resembled golden onion rings.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the calamari filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: Have you tried the chef's special calamari dish?
meanings.sent2: The menu featured a variety of calamari dishes.
meanings.sent3: The calamari dish was so popular, it sold out within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The calamari dish was a masterpiece of flavors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The presentation of the calamari dish was as impressive as its taste.
